name: Projects
tagline: All my developed websites and web apps in process of learning web development
body:
### Welcome 
Hello,my name is Nemanja and I am freelancer/web developer.I am learning how to build professional websites and applications as used by real businesses.

### Skils
* Version control system(Git & GitHub- local development through Linux terminal)
* Basic shell knowledge(navigation,manipulating files,working with commands,I/O
 redirection,expansion,permissions,job control)
* Experience in Linux system environments (Linux Mint Debian Edition user),
* End user support-Windows and Linux,
* Networking Fundamentals and troubleshooting of LAN and WAN
* Cisco CCNA Routing and Switching
* Virtualization(Virtual Box, VM Player)
* Driving license B category (active driver)
* Strong attitude towards personal improvement

### Certifications
* Certificate design in indesign and illustrator [View](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22380934/Certificates.pdf)
* Certificate Fundamentals of programming with C programming language [View](tps://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22380934/Certificates.pdf)
* Duolingo German Fluency: Beginner (Estimated) [View](https://www.duolingo.com/Vitnere)
* Front-end Foundations [View](https://www.codeschool.com/courses/front-end-foundations)
* Try Git [View](https://www.codeschool.com/courses/try-git)

### Contact
Mail address:nemanjakolar@gmail.com
